Interface Window.Builder.Single<W extends Window,S extends Window.Builder.Single<W,S>>

Type Parameters:
W - The window type
S - The builder type
All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable, Window.Builder<W,S>
All Known Subinterfaces:

Enclosing interface:
Window.Builder<W extends Window,S extends Window.Builder<W,S>>
public static interface Window.Builder.Single<W extends Window,S extends Window.Builder.Single<W,S>> extends Window.Builder<W,S>
A single Window builder. Single Windows only have on Gui.
